original_title: มหัศจรรย์เล็กน้อยแต่ยิ่งใหญ่ ตอนร้อยเรื่องรู้
overview: A Talk Radio DJ realizes that he is broadcasting rhetoric, not knowledge gained through life experience.  With the help of a young girl, he finally gains a practical understanding of the world around him.
title: The Greatness of a Little Miracle
